pageContext.claim: “We were up by nearly 700,000 votes in Pennsylvania. I won Pennsylvania by a lot and that gets whittled down to — I think they said now we’re up by 90,000 votes — and they'll keep coming and coming and coming.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump acts as if the count on election night was official. It was just a snapshot in time, with an illusionary “red wave” because in-person votes were dominated by Republicans.
